snippet: Lee Baca, the embattled sheriff, said he would retire at the end of January and not seek re-election, ending speculation about his future amid federal investigations of his department.
abstract: Embattled Los Angeles Sheriff Lee Baca announces that he will retire and not seek re-election; announcement ends speculation about his future amid federal investigations and accusations of widespread misconduct in his department.
lead_paragraph: Lee Baca, the embattled sheriff, said he would retire at the end of January and not seek re-election, ending speculation about his future amid federal investigations of his department.

headline.main: Amid Accusations of Department Misconduct, Los Angeles Sheriff Will Step Down
headline.print_headline: Amid Accusations of Department Misconduct, Los Angeles Sheriff Will Step Down
